sentences.sContent: At present the moral belief crisis is the co-existence of expansibility crisis and the retrogress crisis.
sentences.sContent_eng: At present the moral belief crisis is the co-existence of expansibility crisis and the retrogress crisis.
sentences.sCn: 当前道德信仰危机是发展性危机与倒退性危机并存。

sentences.sContent: Practice has shown that China-Japan relations will go ahead steadily once this political foundation is maintained; otherwise the relations will be undermined, become stagnant or even retrogress.
sentences.sContent_eng: Practice has shown that China-Japan relations will go ahead steadily once this political foundation is maintained; otherwise the relations will be undermined, become stagnant or even retrogress.
sentences.sCn: 实践已经证明，严守和维护这个政治基础，中日关系就能前进，就能持续稳定发展；背离和违反这个政治基础，中日关系就会受损，就会停滞甚至倒退。

words.tran: 倒退的；退化的；次序颠倒的

trans.tranOther: to go back to an earlier, esp worse, condition; degenerate or deteriorate
